game.name: Cats Huddled Together 挤在一起的猫猫们
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 고양이를 주제로 한 퍼즐 게임으로, 두 가지 다른 게임 모드를 포함하고 있습니다. 게임에서 고양이를 만져 보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A puzzle game filled with cats, featuring two gameplay modes. Come and enjoy petting the cats in the game!

reviewHighlights.text: bring much serotonin, good price, me recommend! + cat purr and meow very cute
Cats Huddled Together, developed and published by Catnip Studio, is a cozy, heartwarming puzzle game that perfectly embodies the charm of its title. B...
